text.text: We visited Kidzania on Vesak day and it was the best decision ever! Park was empty and the kids could play almost everything without a queue. Best station has got to be SCDF fire station. Bob n Charlotte was most enthusiastic and encouraging to the kids. Bob had massive loads of energy n made it so fun! Next best was the Paramedics. Kids enjoyed Shopee and Kiss92. They didnt want to leave the park. Awesome place for kids to learn about different occupations, earn money etc

Best station has got to be SCDF fire station. Bob n Charlotte was most enthusiastic and encouraging to the kids. Bob had massive loads of energy n made it so fun! Next best was the Paramedics. Kids enjoyed Shopee and Kiss92. They didnt want to leave the park. Awesome place for kids to learn about different occupations, earn money etc

text.text:
Hulda & Andy very approachable and smiley!!!

The places here indeed very worthy! So many things to explore ! 3years and above more suitable !

If less than 3 years (Infant) might not have a lot of things to do only come for experience ~

Bring stroller & carrier easier to roam around! Toilet access easy~ bring some snacks as adults gonna be hungry hahahaha!

All the staff here are very very experience and friendly!

text.text:
It is highly recommended to go on a weekday. There was no queue for any of the activities. He had the full attention of the staff in each station (literally 1 vs. 1). My child has so much fun pretending and we spent 7 hrs there.

Took 1 star away because the price is steep. But i dont mind bringing him here for a special occasion.

text.text:
Really nice place, we were able to a spend an entire afternoon here and the kids enjoyed themselves a lot.

Each station is very realistic and included a lot of details in the props and process. The experience is pretty rare for kids to learn about medical surgery, firefighting, piloting a plane, manufacturing snacks, e-commerce fulfilment etc.

Just wished we as adults could see the kids in the aeroplane cockpit :)

Buy tickets way in advance for big discount :)

text.text: Today was an absolutely fantastic day for my daughter at Kidzania! She enthusiastically tried over 10 different professions, each offering unique and engaging experiences. The staff members were incredibly friendly and supportive throughout all activities. Despite it being a school holiday, the crowd size remained manageable and waiting times were reasonable. A perfect blend of fun learning and smooth organization - highly recommended for curious young minds!
